Name: Noam Piemaker
Trait: I like to remind people of their inevitable demise.
Ideal: Stoicism. All of us are part of the cyclical march of nature, which will continue with or without us. (Neutral)
Bond: I cherish the finger of a family member who was petrified by a medusa.
Flaw: Death comes for us all, so you can't expect me to take care of someone who can't fight it off.
Equipment: ['Dart', 'Sickle', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', 'Studded Leather Armor', "Thieves' Tools", "Dungeoneer's Pack", "Poisoner's Kit", 'Pet Beetle or Spider', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Duvamil Blackiron
Trait: I take great pains to always look my best and follow the latest fashions.
Ideal: Power. If I can attain more power, no one will tell me what to do. (Evil)
Bond: I will face any challenge to win the approval of my family.
Flaw: I have an insatiable desire for carnal pleasures.
Equipment: ['Scale Mail', '2 Shortswords', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Longbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', 'Set of Fine Clothes', 'Signet Ring or Brooch', 'Scroll of Pedigree', 'Skin of Fine zzar or Wine', '20 GP']
Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Alia Arkalis
Trait: I like to squeeze into small places where no one else can get to me.
Ideal: Change. The low are lifted up, and the high and mighty are brought down. Change is the nature of things. (Chaotic)
Bond: My town or city is my home, and I'll fight to defend it.
Flaw: Gold seems like a lot of money to me, and I'll do just about anything for more of it.
Equipment: ['War pick', '2 Handaxes', "Explorer's Pack", '4 Javelins', 'Small Knife', 'Map of Home City', 'Token to Remember Parents', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Camerus Woolworth
Trait: To me, a tavern brawl is a nice way to get to know a new city.
Ideal: Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)
Bond: The ship is most important-crewmates and captains come and go.
Flaw: My pride will probably lead to my destruction.
Equipment: ['Scale Mail', 'Javelin', 'Spear', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Longbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', 'Belaying Pin', '50 ft. Silk Rope', 'Lucky Charm', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Caeleb Amarzian
Trait: Décorum must be preserved at all costs.
Bond: It's not how you feel, who you know, or what you can do - it's how you look, and I look fabulous.
Flaw: I have no artistic sense. I hide that fact behind extreme opinions and have become a trendsetter.
Equipment: ['Dagger', 'Mace', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', 'Scale Mail', "Thieves' Tools", "Dungeoneer's Pack", "Set of Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument", 'Set of Fine Clothes', '10 GP']
